XIII.i.6.1.h
.
Amount of Lump-Sum Benefits Payable
The amount of retroactive lump-sum benefits payable is equal to the total amount of MOHP the Veteran or service member would have received during the period that
begins on the first day of the month after the date of the event for which the Veteran or service memberÂ earned the Medal of Honor (whether on/before or after October 1, 2003), and
ends on the last day of the month preceding the month in which MOHP was awarded.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 6 - Medal of Honor Pension (MOHP)
